cont.entity_a: Very comfortable and no problem using them over hearing aids. Comfortable to wear with in-line controls working well. Comfortable fit over large ears with glasses. Comfortable to wear for long periods.
cont.entity_b: Most comfortable clip-on ear headphones owned. Clip-on attachments are secure and comfortable.

cont.entity_a: Clear and good for listening to interviews, but not high fidelity. Audio is extremely muddy and muffled, requiring equalizer adjustments. Requires an amp to bring out full sound quality. Good sound reproduction but not durable. Decent sound quality, but lacks noise isolation. Meets expectations for a lower-priced set.
cont.entity_b: Sound is clearer and louder compared to previous versions. Prominent treble with weak bass. Occasional white noise in the background. Superb sound quality.

cont.entity_a: Good deal for the money. Good price at $23.00.
cont.entity_b: Great sound at a great price.

cont.entity_a: Durability issues as plastic covering degrades over time. Not very sturdy; one channel stopped working quickly. Cord broke after a few months of use.
cont.entity_b: Cables are thin and may not be durable long-term. Headphones worked well for two months before failing.

cont.entity_a: Heavy, bulky design with slightly muffled sound quality. Collapsible for easy transport. Headphone jack does not fit tightly into devices. Headphones are light with large cushioned earpads.
cont.entity_b: Looks are not as expected; plastic is white, not clear. Clip-ons are wired together, not individually.

cont.entity_a: Cord is long but can be inconvenient. Long cord is an advantage.
cont.entity_b: Cord is too short and required an extension. Retractable cord is convenient.

cont.entity_a: Volume control is a useful feature. Convenient for adjusting sound levels.
Great sound cancellation and comfort. Not noise cancelling. Does not entirely limit external sounds.
Do not seal around ears well.
cont.entity_b: Fit around the ear is too loose, affecting sound quality.
Retractable mechanism works well. Retractable feature reduces cord tangling. Only one wire is retractable.
